canTradeTokenOnExchange(address,address).details: Checkes whether a token is allowed on an exchange
canTradeTokenOnExchange(address,address).return: Bool the token is whitelisted on the exchange

canWrapTokenOnWrapper(address,address).details: Checkes whether a token is allowed on a wrapper
canWrapTokenOnWrapper(address,address).return: Bool the token is whitelisted on the exchange

getCasper().details: Provides the address of the casper contract

getExchangeAdapter(address).details: Provides the address of the exchange adapter

getSigVerifier().details: Provides the address of the signature verifier

isAuthority(address).details: Provides whether an address is an authority

isCasperInitialized().details: Checkes whether casper has been inizialized
isCasperInitialized().return: Bool the casper contract has been initialized

isMethodAllowed(bytes4,address).details: Checkes whether a method is allowed on an exchange

isWhitelistedAsset(address).details: Provides whether an asset is whitelisted

isWhitelistedExchange(address).details: Provides whether an exchange is whitelisted

isWhitelistedProxy(address).details: Provides whether a proxy is whitelisted

isWhitelistedWrapper(address).details: Provides whether a token wrapper is whitelisted

setAuthority(address,bool).details: Allows the owner to whitelist an authority

setCasper(address).details: Allows the owner to set the casper contract

setExchangeAdapter(address,address).details: Allows the owner to associate an exchange to its adapter

setExchangeEventful(address).details: Allows the owner to set the exchange eventful

params._exchangeEventful: Address of the exchange logs contract

setSignatureVerifier(address).details: Allows the owner to set the signature verifier

setWhitelister(address,bool).details: Allows the owner to whitelist a whitelister

whitelistAsset(address,bool).details: Allows a whitelister to whitelist an asset

whitelistAssetOnExchange(address,address.details: Allows a whitelister to enable trading on a particular exchange

whitelistExchange(address,bool).details: Allows a whitelister to whitelist an exchange

whitelistMethod(bytes4,address,bool).details: Allows an admin to whitelist a factory

whitelistTokenOnWrapper(address,address,.details: Allows a whitelister to enable assiciate wrappers to a token

whitelistTokenTransferProxy(address,bool.details: Allows a whitelister to whitelist a tokenTransferProxy

whitelistWrapper(address,bool).details: Allows a whitelister to whitelist an token wrapper

params._wrapper: Address of the target token wrapper
